did.unittitle: Information Technology Division (University of Michigan) publications 1971-1999 1985-1999
did.abstract: Includes bibliographies, brochures, bulletins, manuals, newsletters, proceedings, and reports from the Information Technology Division. Also contains publications from the Center for Information Technology Integration, Consulting and Support Services, Information Technology General Council, Merit Computer Network, Office of Administrative Systems, Information Systems and Services, Office of Instructional Technology, Telecommunications Systems, University Information Systems and User Services.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The record group was transferred from the Information Technology Division (Donor No. 7873) in several accessions beginning in July 1990.

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the records expected.

accessrestrict.p: The publications are open for research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Information Technology Division (University of Michigan) publications, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: See the history in finding aid for Information Technology Division (University of Michigan) records

scopecontent.p: The Information Technology Division began publishing many of the Computing Center's manuals and newsletters after 1989 and 1990. Before those dates, they may be found in the publications group Computing Center Publications. After the transfer of Computing Center activities to the Information Technology Division, the researcher may find those publication in Information Technology Division Publications. Notes are made to this effect throughout the container lists. Please consult both finding aids.
The ITD Publications subgroup (5 linear feet) is divided into two series: Unit Publications and Sub-Unit Publications.

scopecontent.p: The series Unit Publications includes brochures, manuals, newsletters, proceedings, and reports dating from the years 1971 to 1994. The newsletter Information Technology Digest (1992-1998) was created from the merger of a Computing Center publication, U-M Computing News, and two publications from the Office of Administrative Systems, Communication Lines and the Newsletter (also published by Telecommunications Systems and University Information Systems, respectively). Information Technology Digest was discontinued in 1998 and replaced by the e-mail newsletter, News from ITD. News from ITD is printed out, and issues can be found in this series.

This series also contains a number of manuals which describe the computing environment at the University of Michigan, as well as detailed instructions on how to sign on, how to get help when needed, the proper use policy, and instructions about specific programs and software. These manuals include the New User Guide, and the Reference, Tutorial, and Step-by-Step series. Each of these titles is found in the Unit Publications series, though one or another sub-unit may have contributed to an individual issue's publication.

scopecontent.p: The Sub-Unit Publications series consists of printed materials produced by the sub-units within ITD. The Center for Information Technology Integration produces the bulletin CITI Course Catalog, and the newsletter CITI Lights. The M-Pathways Monthly Status Report can be found in this series. There are also annual reports, newsletters, and monthly status reports from the Office of Administrative Systems, which became University Information Systems. The units under the Office of Administrative Systems include Telecommunications Systems, Data Systems Center and Information Systems and Services.
